formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: There is a core dump, syserr when compiling test 16 for Increment 5.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: There was a missing runtime function array_mt() that was not implemented. In fact, this function does not need to exist. The fix is to use the array_free() which is more or less functionally equivalent. An update to the Software Architecture clarifies exactly what this does when used in the context of an empty return. Additionally, more safeguards are put into place in the code to generate system errors when these sort of behavior occurs.
